critique: This document is an executive order regarding military pay and allowances. It amends a previous executive order to provide a partial basic allowance for quarters to members without dependents when the President allocates increases in basic pay to basic allowances for quarters. There is no direct indication of ideological tilt, immigration approach, executive power expansion or restriction, federalism implications, national security vs. civil liberties concerns, economic regulation, or social inclusion considerations. The order seems to be a technical adjustment to military compensation.
